summary: An Atlanta Assistant District Attorney pursues the conviction of a serial killer.
cast: Jennie Garth|Colin Cunningham|Tyron Leitso|David Lewis|Metta World Peace|Jill Morrison|Elisabeth Rosen|Anne Openshaw|Jason Schombing|Karin Konoval|Lester Scott|Priscilla Faia|Janet Glassford|Andrew Wheeler|Paul Lazenby|Derek Morrison|Shauna Johannesen|Dean Redman|Marco Soriano|Shaw Madson|Angela Moore|Nancy Grace|Peter Dwerryhouse|Jocelyn Panton
title: La última víctima
